text:
Mark Wilson/Getty Images

For the Trump administration's first state dinner, and came dressed to impress.

The FLOTUS and President 's eldest daughter arrived Tuesday to the event honoring French president Emmanuel Macron in stylish ensembles fresh off the runway.
title: Melania and Ivanka Trump Bring the Glamour With Dramatic State Dinner Looks
